posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I'm toying with the idea of starting a Sovereign 150 subset project.  I want to see how many I can pick up without too much effort, and from there, see if I want to tackle the entire subset.  

I have commons and HOFers to trade, and I could also purchase.  I'm not too picky on condition.  Most of my trade material is lower grade.

Please PM or email me if you have any you might be willing to deal (lukealyon@gmail.com)

Thanks!
Anybody have any of these available?  I have some nice VG commons in my other current thread as well as some HOFers for trade.
One more try and I'll quit bumping this for awhile.  Here are some 350s I have for trade, also HOFers and commons. Looking for low grade, mainly.

Probably too rough but......

I have a Manning batting version that is beat around the edges.  Decent pic and back......

Hi Luke,

I have this Sovereign 150 Crandall, No hat, available. Not really interested in trading. $30.00 delivered.

Let me know if your interested.


Best regards,

Joe
